name: Water Slide Rush
description:
Welcome to Water Slide Rush. Feel the real excitement while sliding through the world’s tallest water slides and be ready to face some daring challenges. Make some big water splashes while taking the sharp and narrow turns around the twisty water channels and perform some insane acrobatic stunts without falling off. Riding an aqua slide in the hot summer days is really a fun thing. Enjoy the swimming pool rush as a crazy water surfer and make some new records while rushing down with lightning speed.

Features:
• Different colorful water slides in 3D
• Amazing environments to explore.
• Challenging 3D game levels to enjoy.
• Extreme water park thrills with 3D water slider
• Fastest water racing game action
• Coolest & tallest water slide simulator
